name: Crime - Police Real Town
description:
Crime - Police Real Town is going to be one of the top police car games of 2017. They will try to block your way and can also stop you from moving on. But you have to be brave and face all the hurdles with bravery. You have got a number of levels to play and stop the terrorists. As you move on to the next level, the difficulty increases and the strategy of the terrorists become more stronger. This game is more fun than the police chase thief games. Police chase thief games are going in a normal trend, but police going on a terrorist rescue mission is something unique.
Features:
Interesting animation from police crime games
Highly detailed models of police cars much better than best crime games
Intense shooting missions
Instant Kill Strikes from crime simulator
Collect guns and ammunition
Police vs gangster jobs
Realistic sound effects & graphics
